message.body: I'm going to soak the foot at home. What do you think about turnout? I figure I will try an easy boot and if it fits, maybe he can go out, if not, he can stay in til Gerry gets there?
I'm bummed! We were so ready! Oh well, next time. Also, I left a check in your trunk.
Just saw this,I think he has to go out! Wrap foot? Hopefully you figured out something.really sorry:(
Ok! I poulticed & wrapped earlier. The boot seems too big. I bet he can go out in the square paddock for tonight, it's soft in there.
Otherwise he will walk all night!
I am really sorry you couldn't show:(
Horses, right?? We'll try it again soon!
